channel.title: [ 317 ] Divine Revolution - Your Adventure Starts Here!
channel.description:
[ul][list][CENTER][IMG]http://oi59.tinypic.com/mh4j8m.jpg[/img]
[B][SIZE=3][IMG]http://i918.photobucket.com/albums/ad28/Tomb1443/Notorious%20Advertisement%20Pictures/icon_homepage_zpsfcc29152.png[/img] Website:[/SIZE][/B][SIZE=3] [URL=http://"http://www.divinerevolution317.com/"]Click Here[/URL][/SIZE] [B][SIZE=3][IMG]http://i918.photobucket.com/albums/ad28/Tomb1443/Notorious%20Advertisement%20Pictures/play_zps82372811.gif[/img] Webclient:[/SIZE][/B][SIZE=3] [URL=http://"http://www.divinerevolution317.com/webclient"]Click Here[/URL][/SIZE][B][SIZE=3] [/SIZE][/B][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/72ysmt.png[/img][SIZE=3][B] Forums:[/B] [URL=http://"http://www.divinerevolution317.com/community"]Click Here[/URL][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[SIZE=3][B][COLOR=#009900]Why Should I Play Divine Revolution?[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE] We feel that you shouldn't have to play, we feel that you should want to play. Divine Revolution was created for a community based server. We take great amount of interest and make sure our players have the time they were looking for when they joined. Yes! The owner is very active aswell is the staff team for our server, we make sure our staff team is very respectful and helpful to it's community.
[CENTER][IMG]http://oi57.tinypic.com/65cvtd.jpg[/img][B][COLOR=#009900] [/COLOR][/B][/CENTER]
[B]Server Information:[/B]
[list] [*]Project Insanity 317 [*]Client 317 Loading 508; Object, Npcs, Players, Items. [*]24/7 Up-Time [/list]
[B]Server Game Play Information:[/B] [list] [*]25 Working Skills; Dungeoneering, Construction, Hunter, and Summoning and more. [*]Bossing with; Nex, Corporeal Beast, Bork, and more. [*]Home Area - Varrock & Edgeville (Player Choice Home). [*]Prestige Mode - After obtaining all 99's. [*]Time Played - Days, Hours, and Minutes. [*]Limited Bank Anywhere - Ability to access your bank anywhere. [*]7+ Mini-Games; Nomad, Angry Goblin, Mage Bank, Duel Arena, Tokhaar-Kal Minigame, and more. [*]Max Cape + Emote [*]New Function Keys (F Keys) - Can change them in the setting tab. [*]New or Old Style Hits - Normal or x10 Hits. [*]Full-Screen - Very nice to chill in. [*]Chaotic Items + Many Many More Unique and Special Items In-Game. [*]Normal Prayers and Curses [*]Clue Scrolls (Easy) - Custom to fit the server. [/list]
[HR][/HR]
[B]Starter Kit: [/B][spoiler=Starter Image] [CENTER][IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/b59c71eee440edf91878c35300f29839.png[/img][/CENTER] [/spoiler] [list] [*]2.5M Starting Cash [*]1M Experience Lamp (Up to 25 Skills Available!) [*]Server Guide Book (Get Helpful Tips To Learn The Server Faster!) [*]Ring of Kingship - Fast Teleport to Dung (5M to change ring colors!) [*]Custom Skin Colors + Normal Skin Colors [/list]
[HR][/HR] [B]Available Skills:[/B] [spoiler=Preview of our 25 working skills.]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/0fa16a74cb2a0415c5ba27bc3c8229c3.png[/img][/CENTER] [/spoiler] [LIST=1] [*]Attack [*]Strength [*]Defence [*]Range [*]Prayer [*]Magic [*]RuneCrafting [*]Construction [*]Dungeoneering [*]Hp / Constitution [*]Agility [*]Herblore [*]Thieving [*]Crafting [*]Fletching [*]Slayer [*]Hunter [*]Mining [*]Smithing [*]Fishing [*]Cooking [*]FireMaking [*]WoodCutting [*]Farming [*]Summoning [/list]
[HR][/HR] [B]Player Bossing:[/B]
[spoiler=Bossing Preview] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/04807b976d1997e14a95018fe56fe0b1.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[LIST=1] [*]Kalphite Queens (There are 2) [*]Forgotten Warrior [*]Barebones [*]BarrelsChest [*]GodWars (Bandos, Zamorak, Saradomin, and Armadyl) [*]King Black Dragon [*]Dagannoth Kings [*]Tormented Demons [*]Corporeal Beast [*]Nex - Does drop Nex Armours [*][COLOR=#ff0000][B](NEW)[/B][/COLOR] - Bork - Drops PvP Armours![/ul]
[HR][/HR] [B]Mini-Games: [/B][spoiler=Staking at duel arena] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/d240f89e83b8d78c56c95964bdafe4ba.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[ul][*]Duel Arena (Staking & Dupes Patched) [*]Recipe for Disaster (Safe MiniGame) [*]Nomad [*]Angry Goblin [*]Barrows (Fully Working) [*]Pest Control [*]Tzhaar Caves (Both FireCapes) [*]FunPk [*]Warriors Guide[/ul]
[HR][/HR][CENTER][IMG]http://oi62.tinypic.com/sy74gx.jpg[/img][/CENTER] [spoiler=Ingame Photos] [CENTER][IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/9f30880d3cfa75563cd24fac5aefa803.png[/img][IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/226193c29dba43059dc11018fcc71025.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/72cd82f6ebc1c23fb0ed80016c9dff1e.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/f755eafd5d8385d20ab81a7cdf5ef82f.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/39e9c4b91c7a3d153777c1a3e47d0240.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/bcf12645907dfc61f42887768e73f4c9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/74a05d97f49b9ddd4314f3fdc6cd05df.png[/img][/CENTER] [/spoiler]
[HR][/HR]
[CENTER][IMG]http://oi60.tinypic.com/300bmlk.jpg[/img]

item.title: [ 317 ] Divine Revolution - Your Adventure Starts Here!
item.dc:creator: @killerkody killerkody
item.description:
@killerkody wrote:

I don’t understand how pink skin makes you want to leave? It’s something there for if someone does like it or not. Very few people use it but some people enjoy the custom colors, not sure why it’s a large problem.

Updates:

Head Administrator (Og Kush) has updated the forums a bit more for easier access to get around on our forums and opened a few new areas to chill an chat in.

Moderator (Happy) is in the process of making me a large list to get us updated a bit more so we can start getting more updates and have the server running a bit better.

Side Note: Looking to pay someone to check every dupe on my server so if you know all the dupes feel free to spot by my server and let me know you seen this message. I don’t want oh I just checked 5 dupes yeah im done I want every dupe checked!

Read full topic
item.source: [ 317 ] Divine Revolution - Your Adventure Starts Here!

item.title: [ 317 ] Divine Revolution - Your Adventure Starts Here!
item.dc:creator: @killerkody killerkody
item.description:
@killerkody wrote:

Agree, our server was create for a community base. Pink skin has nothing to do with the server it just makes it a bit more unique. We have some recolors not sure how that’s a bit deal. We have alot to offer to everyone! Thanks for your feedback though, wish you would have gave the server more of a chance instead of leaving for such a low reason…

New Updates: New Items / Fixed Lamps / Edited New Items.

Read full topic
item.source: [ 317 ] Divine Revolution - Your Adventure Starts Here!

item.title: [ 317 ] Divine Revolution - Your Adventure Starts Here!
item.dc:creator: @killerkody killerkody
item.description:
@killerkody wrote:

[quote=“CoderOops, post:2, topic:541631”]You guys have very bad style to advertise on other servers…

anyways cant see anything impressive,

GL tho[/quote]

I personally don’t advertise on other server, If someone were to advertise on a server I can’t help that sorry. Thanks for your feedback though.
